00105         Vector(
00106             int n,
00107             double value
00108             )
00109         {
00110             _length = n;
00111             _data = new double[_length];
00112             for(int i = 0; i < _length; i++)
00113             {
00114                 _data[i] = value;
00115             }
00116         }

00137         public static
00138         Vector
00139         Create(
00140             double[] components
00141             )
00142         {
00143             if(null == components)
00144             {
00145                 throw new ArgumentNullException("components");
00146             }
00147 
00148             double[] newData = new double[components.Length];
00149             components.CopyTo(newData, 0);
00150 
00151             return new Vector(newData);
00152         }
00153 
00163         public static
00164         Vector
00165         Random(
00166             int n,
00167             IContinuousGenerator randomDistribution
00168             )
00169         {
00170             double[] data = new double[n];
00171             for(int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)
00172             {
00173                 data[i] = randomDistribution.NextDouble();
00174             }
00175 
00176             return new Vector(data);
00177         }
00178 
00187         public static
00188         Vector
00189         Random(
00190             int n
00191             )
00192         {
00193             return Random(n, new RandomSources.SystemRandomSource());
00194         }

00278         public
00279         Matrix
00280         ToColumnMatrix()
00281         {
00282             double[][] m = Matrix.CreateMatrixData(_length, 1);
00283             for(int i = 0; i < _data.Length; i++)
00284             {
00285                 m[i][0] = _data[i];
00286             }
00287 
00288             return new Matrix(m);
00289         }
00290 
00294         public
00295         Matrix
00296         ToRowMatrix()
00297         {
00298             double[][] m = Matrix.CreateMatrixData(1, _length);
00299             double[] mRow = m[0];
00300             for(int i = 0; i < _data.Length; i++)
00301             {
00302                 mRow[i] = _data[i];
00303             }
00304 
00305             return new Matrix(m);
00306         }

00609         public static
00610         double
00611         ScalarProduct(
00612             IVector<double> u,
00613             IVector<double> v
00614             )
00615         {
00616             CheckMatchingVectorDimensions(u, v);
00617 
00618             double sum = 0;
00619             for(int i = 0; i < u.Length; i++)
00620             {
00621                 sum += u[i] * v[i];
00622             }
00623 
00624             return sum;
00625         }

00642             IVector<double> b
00643             )
00644         {
00645             return ScalarProduct(this, b);
00646         }
00647 
00655         public static
00656         Matrix
00657         DyadicProduct(
00658             IVector<double> u,
00659             IVector<double> v
00660             )
00661         {
00662             double[][] m = Matrix.CreateMatrixData(u.Length, v.Length);
00663             for(int i = 0; i < u.Length; i++)
00664             {
00665                 for(int j = 0; j < v.Length; j++)
00666                 {
00667                     m[i][j] = u[i] * v[j];
00668                 }
00669             }
00670 
00671             return new Matrix(m);
00672         }
00673

00683         Matrix
00684         TensorMultiply(
00685             IVector<double> b
00686             )
00687         {
00688             return DyadicProduct(this, b);
00689         }
00690 
00698         public static
00699         Vector
00700         CrossProduct(
00701             IVector<double> u,
00702             IVector<double> v
00703             )
00704         {
00705             CheckMatchingVectorDimensions(u, v);
00706             if(3 != u.Length)
00707             {
00708                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("u", Resources.ArgumentVectorThreeDimensional);
00709             }
00710 
00711             Vector product = new Vector(new double[] {
00712                 u[1]*v[2] - u[2]*v[1],
00713                 u[2]*v[0] - u[0]*v[2],
00714                 u[0]*v[1] - u[1]*v[0]
00715                 });
00716 
00717             return product;
00718         }
00719

00729         Vector
00730         CrossMultiply(
00731             IVector<double> b
00732             )
00733         {
00734             return CrossProduct(this, b);
00735         }

00745         public static
00746         Vector
00747         ArrayProduct(
00748             IVector<double> a,
00749             IVector<double> b
00750             )
00751         {
00752             CheckMatchingVectorDimensions(a, b);
00753 
00754             double[] v = new double[a.Length];
00755             for(int i = 0; i < v.Length; i++)
00756             {
00757                 v[i] = a[i] * b[i];
00758             }
00759 
00760             return new Vector(v);
00761         }

00869         #region Vector Norms
00870 
00877         public
00878         double
00879         Norm()
00880         {
00881             double sum = 0;
00882             for(int i = 0; i < _data.Length; i++)
00883             {
00884                 sum = Fn.Hypot(sum, _data[i]);
00885             }
00886 
00887             return sum;
00888         }
00889 
00896         public
00897         double
00898         SquaredNorm()
00899         {
00900             double sum = 0;
00901             for(int i = 0; i < _data.Length; i++)
00902             {
00903                 sum = Fn.Hypot(sum, _data[i]);
00904             }
00905 
00906             return sum * sum;
00907         }
00908 
00915         public
00916         double
00917         Norm1()
00918         {
00919             double sum = 0;
00920             for(int i = 0; i < _data.Length; i++)
00921             {
00922                 sum += Math.Abs(_data[i]);
00923             }
00924 
00925             return sum;
00926         }
00927 
00934         public
00935         double
00936         NormP(
00937             int p
00938             )
00939         {
00940             if(1 > p)
00941             {
00942                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("p");
00943             }
00944 
00945             if(1 == p)
00946             {
00947                 return Norm1();
00948             }
00949 
00950             if(2 == p)
00951             {
00952                 return Norm();
00953             }
00954 
00955             double sum = 0;
00956             for(int i = 0; i < _data.Length; i++)
00957             {
00958                 sum += Math.Pow(Math.Abs(_data[i]), p);
00959             }
00960 
00961             return Math.Pow(sum, 1.0 / p);
00962         }
00963 
00970         public
00971         double
00972         NormInf()
00973         {
00974             double max = 0;
00975             for(int i = 0; i < _data.Length; i++)
00976             {
00977                 max = Math.Max(max, Math.Abs(_data[i]));
00978             }
00979 
00980             return max;
00981         }
00982 
00986         public
00987         Vector
00988         Normalize()
00989         {
00990             double norm = Norm();
00991             if(Number.AlmostEqual(0.0, norm))
00992             {
00993                 return Clone();
00994             }
00995 
00996             return Scale(1 / norm);
00997         }

01136         #region Various Helpers & Infrastructure
01137 
01139         private static
01140         void
01141         CheckMatchingVectorDimensions(
01142             IVector<double> A,
01143             IVector<double> B
01144             )
01145         {
01146             if(null == A)
01147             {
01148                 throw new ArgumentNullException("A");
01149             }
01150 
01151             if(null == B)
01152             {
01153                 throw new ArgumentNullException("B");
01154             }
01155 
01156             if(A.Length != B.Length)
01157             {
01158                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentVectorsSameLengths);
01159             }
01160         }
01161 
01163         public
01164         Vector
01165         Clone()
01166         {
01167             return Create(_data);
01168         }
01169 
01173         object
01174         ICloneable.Clone()
01175         {
01176             return Create(_data);
01177         }
01178 
01182         public static
01183         bool
01184         AlmostEqual(
01185             Vector u,
01186             Vector v,
01187             double relativeAccuracy
01188             )
01189         {
01190             return Number.AlmostEqualNorm(u.Norm1(), v.Norm1(), (u - v).Norm1(), relativeAccuracy);
01191         }
01192 
01196         public static
01197         bool
01198         AlmostEqual(
01199             Vector u,
01200             Vector v
01201             )
01202         {
01203             return Number.AlmostEqualNorm(u.Norm1(), v.Norm1(), (u - v).Norm1(), 10 * Number.DefaultRelativeAccuracy);
01204         }
01205 
01209         public override
01210         string
01211         ToString()
01212         {
01213             StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
01214             sb.Append("[");
01215 
01216             for(int i = 0; i < _data.Length; i++)
01217             {
01218                 if(i != 0)
01219                 {
01220                     sb.Append(',');
01221                 }
01222 
01223                 sb.Append(_data[i]);
01224             }
01225 
01226             sb.Append("]");
01227             return sb.ToString();
01228         }
